verse.name: v1
verse.lines: You called my name, reached out your hand newline Restored my life, and I was redeemed newline The moment you entered my life

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Amazing grace, Christ gave that day newline My life was changed when from my shoulders newline Fell the weight of my sin

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: So it's with everything I am newline I reach out for your hand newline The hope for change newline The second chance I've gained

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: On you I throw my life newline Casting all my fears aside newline Hoe could greater love than this newline Ever possibly exist

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Consume my thoughts newline As I rest in You newline I'm now in love with a Saviour newline Bearing the marks of His love

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: So I'll wait upon you now newline With my hands released to You newline Where a little faith's enough newline To see mountains lift and move newline And I'll wait upon you now newline Dedicated to Your will newline A love that never fails
